text: 28 Mar 2025 New Mystery & Thriller Novels for Fans of Tana French Love your mysteries moody, character-driven, and laced with slow-burning suspense? If Tana French’s psychological depth and lyrical storytelling keep you coming back for more, these new releases will be right up your shadowy alley. From haunting small towns to twisted investigations, these thrillers deliver rich atmosphere, flawed detectives, and secrets that refuse to stay buried. The Hunter by Owen Greer Release Date: February 15 2025 Following the American military withdrawal from Afghanistan in August 2021, Martin Devereaux, a Delta Force operator, stays behind to evacuate his Afghan translator and his family. When the family is killed by ISIS-K, Devereaux vows revenge but finds himself pursued by the Taliban, ISIS-K, and his own government, who now sees him as a rogue agent. Buy on Amazon Rum Away (Livvy Mercer Mysteries Book 1) by Brett Monk Release Date: March 18 2025 Meet Livvy Mercer – The Crime Solving Bartender who never forgets a face! When Livvy’s estranged mom guilts her into taking a job at a retirement home, a coworker goes missing. The sweet old gentleman she befriended may be a serial killer, and the FBI agent who investigates is the last person she wants to see again. His memory is clear, but all these years later, the facts don’t add up…which is something he cannot ignore. Buy on Amazon Fear for Her Life (Detectives Kane and Alton Book 25) by D.K. Hood Release Date: March 25 2025 She stumbles over knotted roots as she races through the dark, unforgiving forest. Her legs ache and her teeth chatter from the biting cold. She hears a branch snap behind her. Her worst nightmare is about to begin. They have found her… Buy on Amazon Message Deleted by K.L. Slater Release Date: March 3 2025 She says she never sent me a message and she’s fine. And when I look at my phone, the message is deleted. But six hours later, the police are at my door. Leona and her family have disappeared, their dinner burned, blood all over the kitchen. My best friend and her beautiful family are missing. I was the last one to see them alive… Buy on Amazon Journey’s War (Journey Russo FBI Mystery Series Book 9) by Mary Stone Release Date: March 17 2025 As her best lead goes up in literal flame, Journey grapples with the scorched memories of her past while hunting a man who sees himself as divine justice. html:
28 Mar 2025

New Mystery & Thriller Novels for Fans of Tana French

Love your mysteries moody, character-driven, and laced with slow-burning suspense? If Tana French’s psychological depth and lyrical storytelling keep you coming back for more, these new releases will be right up your shadowy alley. From haunting small towns to twisted investigations, these thrillers deliver rich atmosphere, flawed detectives, and secrets that refuse to stay buried.

The Hunter

by Owen Greer

Release Date: February 15 2025

Following the American military withdrawal from Afghanistan in August 2021, Martin Devereaux, a Delta Force operator, stays behind to evacuate his Afghan translator and his family. When the family is killed by ISIS-K, Devereaux vows revenge but finds himself pursued by the Taliban, ISIS-K, and his own government, who now sees him as a rogue agent.

Buy on Amazon

Rum Away (Livvy Mercer Mysteries Book 1)

by Brett Monk

Release Date: March 18 2025

Meet Livvy Mercer – The Crime Solving Bartender who never forgets a face! When Livvy’s estranged mom guilts her into taking a job at a retirement home, a coworker goes missing. The sweet old gentleman she befriended may be a serial killer, and the FBI agent who investigates is the last person she wants to see again.

Buy on Amazon

Nobody’s Fool

by Harlan Coben

Release Date: March 25 2025

In this stunningly twisty thriller from #1 New York Times bestselling author Harlan Coben, a secret from former Detective Sami Kierce’s college days comes back to haunt him. His memory is clear, but all these years later, the facts don’t add up…which is something he cannot ignore.

Buy on Amazon

Fear for Her Life (Detectives Kane and Alton Book 25)

by D.K. Hood

Release Date: March 25 2025

She stumbles over knotted roots as she races through the dark, unforgiving forest. Her legs ache and her teeth chatter from the biting cold. She hears a branch snap behind her. Her worst nightmare is about to begin. They have found her…

Buy on Amazon

Message Deleted

by K.L. Slater

Release Date: March 3 2025

She says she never sent me a message and she’s fine. And when I look at my phone, the message is deleted. But six hours later, the police are at my door. Leona and her family have disappeared, their dinner burned, blood all over the kitchen. My best friend and her beautiful family are missing. I was the last one to see them alive…

Buy on Amazon

Journey’s War (Journey Russo FBI Mystery Series Book 9)

by Mary Stone

Release Date: March 17 2025

As her best lead goes up in literal flame, Journey grapples with the scorched memories of her past while hunting a man who sees himself as divine justice. He believes he’s right, and he’s determined to cleanse the world in fire to prove it. Starting with her.

Buy on Amazon
